name: Colonizer (itch)
description:
Play as a astronaut in this top down shooter. Explore the three planets to find your space ship or see how long you last in the survival mode!

 In order to control the player you must use the W,A,S,D keys for player movement and the mouse for aiming and shooting.

If you are in the games levels you can press 1,2,3,4 to switch your weapon. Weapons other than your default gun have a set value of ammo that can be refilled with ammo pick ups.

If you are in the survival mode the weapons can only switch by picking up weapon pick ups dropped by enemies.

I hope you have as much fun playing our game as we did making it.
